author: Ahmed Aboudouh, Ahmed Aboudouh
title: China's lack of transparency did nothing for the coronavirus pandemic – but it's Trump who will launch the second wave
description: By rebranding a major international health crisis as a weapon of 'fake news media' and the Democrats, he isn't just endangering Americans, he's putting lives at risk around the globe
content:
One crisis doesnt seem enough for President Donald Trump. Determined to create a new one, the new liberate movement, with his backing, has the potential to become a new threat to yet more lives and economies around the world.
What Trump is trying to do in hi… [+8069 chars]
